participant_1.background:

My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy.
i am in a jazz band and play the saxophone.
i wish i could live in a fantasy world.
My parents are very supportive of my cooking and baking.

i can t get enough of rap music , it s so good.

I think it's important to be prepared for any situation, and that includes knowing how to defend yourself.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hey, I'm doing well thanks! Just finished a long ride on my favorite horse.
That sounds fun! I've never been on a horse before.
You should try it! It's a great way to relax and get some exercise.
I might have to try that sometime. I have a lot of anxiety, and I think being around animals might help.
That's a good idea! Animals are very calming.
Yeah, they are. I'm glad you have a favorite horse. I wish I had a pet, but I live in a small apartment.
Oh, that's too bad. I have a dog and a cat, and they're both great companions.
I'm sure they are! I love animals.
Me too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, cook, and bake. I'm also in a jazz band.
That's cool! I like to listen to music, but I'm not very good at playing it.
Neither am I! I just started playing the saxophone a few years ago.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm always impressed by people who can play musical instruments.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to express yourself.
I agree! I love listening to music. It can really make me feel good.
Me too! What are your favorite genres of music?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially love rap music.
Oh, that's cool! I like some rap music too. What are some of your favorite artists?
I like Kendrick Lamar, Drake, J. Cole, and Lil Uzi Vert.
I've heard good things about Kendrick Lamar. I'll have to check him out.
Yeah, he's really good! I think you'd like him.
I'm sure I would. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about music.
